snippet: Europe’s largest software maker, SAP, has been on an acquisition binge over the last 18 months. So far, the deals have made strategic sense, but SAP has been willing to pay a premium, especially for its latest purchase, Hybris.
abstract: Europe’s largest software maker, SAP, has been on an acquisition binge over the last 18 months. So far, the deals have made strategic sense, but SAP has been willing to pay a premium, especially for its latest purchase, Hybris.

headline.main: SAP Paying Top Dollar in a Buying Spree
